header.preHeaderCtaLabel: Sign Up Today for our 2022 Summer Camps

testimonialsList.title: Eleanor H
testimonialsList.testimonialBody: "Broken Heart has the kind of programs where your teammates come to support you even when they aren't showing that day.  Everyone, no matter the age, has a team spirit that I haven't been able to find elsewhere."

testimonialsList.title: Maddie F
testimonialsList.testimonialBody: "Over the past 13 years of riding, I’ve gone through many trainers, but not one like Erin. Ever since joining the CU Boulder Equestrian Team, Erin has made me a more confident rider. Erin is a top notch trainer and I admire her skills and teaching methods."

testimonialsList.title: Mindy F
testimonialsList.testimonialBody: "I can't thank Erin enough for all she has done for both me and my daughter!  Erin has given my girl not only confidence in her ability to ride, but confidence in herself."

testimonialsList.title: Michelle A
testimonialsList.testimonialBody: "In the four years that my daughter has been riding with Erin, I have seen her confidence and abilities as a rider grow tremendously. The way Erin connects with her riders goes behind the basic reasoning and goes into depth of her training and instructions."

testimonialsList.title: Jordyn, Age 16
testimonialsList.testimonialBody: "Erin has helped me and my horse become a team. She helped me train him to be a safe, reliable horse. She also creates a safe and positive environment for the two of us. I'm looking forward to growing and learning more with Broken Heart!"

testimonialsList.title: Aja Bos
testimonialsList.testimonialBody: "Erin is very patient and is excellent at teaching each rider how to work with their horse"

testimonialsList.title: Mindy F
testimonialsList.testimonialBody: "When we decided we were ready to purchase our first horse, Erin took the time to find exactly what we needed within our budget!  Erin has an amazing eye and could tell right away if a certain horse was going to work for us, or not."

testimonialsList.title: Maisie, Age 10
testimonialsList.testimonialBody: "My favorite part of summer camp is the parent show at the end of the week.  I like it because you get to show off all your skills to your parents and you get to introduce them to the horses."

testimonialsList.title: Harper, Age 11
testimonialsList.testimonialBody: "My favorite pard of horse camp is getting to fide new horses and try new stuff."

testimonialsList.title: Jalynn & Janelle, Ages 11 & 9
testimonialsList.testimonialBody:
"My favorite thing about summer camp was that I got to ride one handed."

"My favorite thing about summer camp was that I got to jump for the first time."

testimonialsList.title: Nell L
testimonialsList.testimonialBody: "Summer camp with Broken Heart is amazing. It's messy, get into nature, ride a horse, old fashioned, fun that every kids needs to experience. The kids come home excited, proud, and so tired.  I cannot recommend this camp enough."
